attributes.action: To change the smear screening age from 25 to the age of 16 when sex is legal
attributes.background: Too many people below the age of 25 are being diagnosed with either a CIN diagnosis or cervical cancer. I myself at the age of 19 was diagnosed with CIN 3 after being put forward for a smear test while having a routine check up. If you can legally have sex at 16 you should Be able to have the test !
